title: What would your favorite champion ask Santa for Christmas?
body:
Hey boards! 
I'm working on a holiday doodle and could use some help/inspiration

it's a picture of workshop nunu helping to wrap presents 
What would your favorite/main champ want for Christmas?

thanks fam!

replies.body:
{{champion:28}} http://www.brookstone.com/dis/dw/image/v2/AAYH_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-itemmaster_Brookstone/default/dwfe4a490c/hi-res/314296p.jpg?sw=500
["it takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels."](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/2a/Evelynn.move7.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121127035803)
It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels.
I'm guffawing
{{champion:36}} http://kunaltravel.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/passport.jpg To go where he pleases.
That's the best one
{{champion:24}} a real weapon.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Jax.joke.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121127045836

{{champion:84}}  Wants some buffs. Changed passive would be nice.

https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder264/500x/73303264.jpg
Bitch please, Yorick waited 4 and a half seasons for his VGU. Akali can wait.

{{champion:41}}

2. His Ship Back
3. His City Back
4. Illoai Back

That's covered under #5
6. More powder
{{champion:82}} A rework with a restraining order against CertainlyT.

{{champion:102}} - A full set of dragon statuettes.  Collect all five!
{{champion:202}} - A silencer, so he no longer has to be loud.
{{champion:25}} - Caitlyn's secret cupcake recipe.
{{champion:10}} - Some of Morgana's gingerbread cookies.
{{champion:122}} - A framed poster of Gaston signed by his voice actor.
{{champion:86}} - Slay Belle Katarina (again).

{{champion:111}} : A big ass candy cane anchor.
{{champion:98}} : ~~some fucking buffs~~ Balance
{{champion:201}} : Gonna give himself a Keg of Gragas's Beer...
{{champion:412}} : Souls. And a puppy.
{{champion:432}} : He keeps on saying he wants _**BWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOONG**_. I don't know what that is...
Maybe he has a speech problem and is asking for a bong?

{{champion:163}} : I want the three greatest teachers!

You FAIL!

{{champion:161}}: Wants a microscope (so he can analyze better -> someone remember the "accident" from snowdown one or two years ago?).
{{champion:245}}: Wants some components to build a machine.
{{champion:17}}: Wants a friendly hug after all the hate he got.
{{champion:119}}: Wants a fabulous self portrait.
{{champion:240}}: Wants that you f+ck+ng leave him alone, you little piece of sh+t.
{{champion:104}}: Wants a new cigar, after someone has stolen his.
DonÂ´t take Kled to seriously. His therapists said he is "special".
Correction: Tacos.
{{champion:32}} Christmas cheer. Maybe a friend?
Woah woah, he's Santa not a miracle worker.
